Package de.stocker.model.dataWrappers

Class AlarmUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stocker.model.dataWrappers.PaintableChartComponent
      • de.stocker.model.dataWrappers.AlarmUnit
  • public class AlarmUnit
extends PaintableChartComponent
    The Class AlarmUnit contains all information about a chart alarm packaged into one object: the stock information, the threshold, the alarm position and its drawing color.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private EAlarmPos position  
      private java.lang.String stockId  
      private double threshold

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AlarmUnit​(double threshold, EAlarmPos position)
      Instantiates a new alarm unit without stock information or color.
      AlarmUnit​(java.lang.String stockId, double threshold, EAlarmPos position, java.awt.Color color)
      Instantiates a new alarm unit with stock information and the drawing color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlarmUnit

        public AlarmUnit​(double threshold,
                 EAlarmPos position)
        Instantiates a new alarm unit without stock information or color. Primarily used for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the alarm threshold
        position - the position set depending on whether the threshold is below or above the current price

      • AlarmUnit

        public AlarmUnit​(java.lang.String stockId,
                 double threshold,
                 EAlarmPos position,
                 java.awt.Color color)
        Instantiates a new alarm unit with stock information and the drawing color.
        Parameters:
        stockId - the stock id
        threshold - the alarm threshold
        position - the position set depending on whether the threshold is below or above the current price
        color - the color used to draw the alarm line on the chart

    • Method Detail

      • getThreshold

        public double getThreshold()
        Gets the alarm threshold price
        Returns:
        the threshold

      • getPosition

        public EAlarmPos getPosition()
        Gets the alarm position: below or above the current price
        Returns:
        the position

      • getStockId

        public java.lang.String getStockId()
        Gets the stock id.
        Returns:
        the stock id

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriding the toString() method. This is used to conveniently print the alarm threshold, e. g. in the list of alarms added in a chart frame.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the threshold as string
